alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Brevard and east central Orange Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Haulover Canal to near Christmas. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Cocoa, Wedgefield, Port Saint John and Christmas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
